amendment.description: To require the Secretary to conduct a 3-year program of research, development, and demonstration on the use of ethanol and other low-cost transportable renewable feedstocks as intermediate fuels for the safe, energy efficient, and cost-effective transportation of hydrogen.

action.text: Amendment SA 988 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Harkin.

vote.text: Amendment SA 988 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
